greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Remainder when n is divided by the number of nonprimes not exceeding n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) = n mod (n-pi(n)) = n mod (n-A000720(n)) = n mod A062298(n).
mathematica: Table[Mod[n, Count[Range@ n, k_ /; ! PrimeQ@ k]], {n, 78}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jan 01 2017 *)
program: (PARI) { for (n = 1, 1000, a=n%(n - primepi(n)); write("b065864.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Nov 02 2009
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 26 2001
